nodes.documentation:
The PowerGrid contract specify the interaction of end-user with the power grid.

 * The smart contract provides the functionality to:
		- put energy into power grid (putEnergy)
		- retrieve energy from power grid (retrieveEnergy).
 * 1 unit of energy represents 4 tokens (see calculateNumberOfTokens method).
nodes.name: PowerGrid

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Amount exceds the energy stored into PowerGrid right now."

arguments.value: Amount exceds the energy stored into PowerGrid right now.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Amount exceds the energy stored into PowerGrid right now."
